verbose_text: This transient elevation in Ca 2+ triggers the exocytosis of Weibel-Palade bodies (small, preformed intracytoplasmic vesicles containing essentially two proteins, von-Willebrand Factor and P-selectin) and induces the addressing of P-Selectin to the endothelial surface, which contributes to leukocyte binding on the vessel wall.
evidence: Ca 2+  triggers the exocytosis of Weibel-Palade bodies (small, preformed intracytoplasmic vesicles containing essentially two proteins, von-Willebrand Factor and P-selectin) and induces the addressing of P-Selectin
